titleStmt.title: Yenga Hiti Stone of Bhimarjuna and Viṣṇugupta Inscription

respStmt.resp: Original EpiDoc Encoding for Siddham, following published edition unless otherwise noted in comments

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit thttps://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
svasti mānagr̥hāt sakala-jana-nirupadravopāya-saṁvidhānaika-
citta-santāno licchavi-kula-ketur bhaṭṭāraka-mahārāja-śrī-bhīmārjuna-
devas tat-sahitaḥ śrīmat-kailāsa-kūṭa-bhavanād aparimitābhimata-
nr̥pati-guṇa-kalāpāviṣkr̥ta-mūrtir anava-gītāvadāta-jñāna-mayū
khāpasārita-sakala-ripu-timira-sañcayo bhagavat-paśupati-bhaṭṭtāra
ka-pādānugr̥hīto bappa-pādānudhyātaḥ śrī-viṣṇuguptaḥ kuśalī bhavi
ṣyato nepāla-bhū-bhujo yathārham pratimānyānudarśayati viditam a
stu bhavatāṁ sakala-jagad-avasānodayaika-kāraṇasyodāratara-ma
himāvāpti-nidhāna-bhūtasya bhagavato viṣṇor jala-śayana-rūpa-ni
ṣpādana-yogya-br̥hac-chilā-karṣaṇa-vyāpāra-parituṣṭair asmābhir dakṣiṇa-ko
lī-grāmasya pūrvam eva draṅga-catur-bhāgatvena pravibhaktasyaitat-sīma-nivā
sinām padaka-keyūra-nūpurān varjayitvānyaiḥ prasādābharaṇa-paribho
gaiḥ prasādaḥ kr̥to yeṣāñ caitat-sthāna-nivāsinām prasādābharaṇāni pūrva-
prabhr̥tyaiva vidyamānāni teṣām ayam adhiko ’smat-prasādo ye vā punar e
tad-draṅga-catur-bhāga-sīmābhyantara-vartinaś caura-paradāra-hatyā-rāja-drohakā
parādham avāpnuyus teṣām evāmunāparādhena doṣavatāṁ yad ātmī
yam eva gr̥ha-kṣetra-godhanādi-dravyan tad eva rāja-ku e
ṣābhiśastānāṁ ye dāyādās tebhyo nyāyenāyam api ñ ca kra
ṣṭavyam ity eṣa ca bhavata smat-kr̥ta-prasādopakārā
rtho bhaviṣyadbhir api bhūpatibhi sva-kr̥ta-nirviśiṣṭatayā
manyamānai jai nupālanīya r api s tair api nai
m alpāpi bādhā vidheyā yadi punar etad-ājñā i nānyathā pravarti
ṣyante nitarām eva te na marṣayitavyā Iti pratipālanā. saṁvat 60 4
phālguna-śukla-dvitīyāyām dūtakaś cātra śrī-yuvarāja-śrī-daraguptaḥ
